definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: It is hoped that the two nations can enhance their cooperation in key projects so as to create a win-win situation.
sentences.chinese: 希望兩國加強在重大項目上的合作，實現互利共贏。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new and old customers to seek cooperation and win-win development.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎廣大新老客戶前來謀商合作，共贏發展。

sentences.english: We welcome new and old customers work together, mutual benefit and create a better future.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎新老客戶攜手合作，相互共贏，共創未來。

sentences.english: Changsha Dingli drives with you to achieve win-win development.
sentences.chinese: 長沙鼎立願與您實現共贏發展。

sentences.english: China is also firmly committed to the win-win strategy of opening up.
sentences.chinese: 中國始終不渝奉行互利共贏的開放戰略。

sentences.english: Han Jin always treat every customer in line with win-win cooperative philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 漢金本着合作共贏的理念真誠的對待每一位客戶。

sentences.english: Second, we should pursue a well-coordinated and inter-connected approach to develop a model of open and win-win cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 第二，堅持協同聯動，打造開放共贏的合作模式。

sentences.english: Win-win-win Solutions - We believe in finding win-win-win solutions to every problem or opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅信共贏是解決問題和把握機遇的最佳方案。

sentences.english: Division Two win-win cooperation, to provide customers with comprehensive services.
sentences.chinese: 兩大事業部協作共贏，爲客戶提供全面優質服務。

sentences.english: Ultimately both public and private entities will have to work together. And soon.
sentences.chinese: 最終，公衆將和私企協作共贏，而這很快會成爲現實。

sentences.english: This is a basic prerequisite to win-win cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 這是實現合作共贏的基本前提。

sentences.english: Second, economic cooperation should be enhanced to seek innovation and realize mutual benefits.
sentences.chinese: 加強經濟合作，努力開拓創新，實現互利共贏。

sentences.english: ZOV brand factory, wisdom leads the brand, to achieve the great win-win.
sentences.chinese: 卓越品牌工廠，品牌智造，成就共贏。

sentences.english: Fourthly, China is a country that advocates win-win cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 第四，中國是一個主張互利共贏的國家。

sentences.english: On your second question, China-US economic and trade relations are essentially mutually beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 關於第二個問題，中美經貿關係的本質是互利共贏。

sentences.english: China a follows a win-win strategy of opening-up and is doing all it can to contribute to world development.
sentences.chinese: 中國奉行互利共贏的開放戰略，積極爲世界發展盡力。

definition: profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
